body_html:
It seems that I need MPSS to manage the Xeon and I see that Intel just released the RedHat and Suse versions. I have Debian, can I install it?
I found some instructions for converting the rpm packages into deb files. Do they work?
Is there any suggestion?

body:
It seems that I need MPSS to manage the Xeon and I see that Intel just released the RedHat and Suse versions. I have Debian, can I install it? 
I found some instructions for converting the rpm packages into deb files. Do they work? 
Is there any suggestion?
